channel.title: Krysis-RS
channel.description:
Recently i have made a pratty successful server: Krysis-rs!
Note: this is my 1st server so may not be best:
Features @@ Dungeoneering is 100% added now with bosses! @@ -So far has Har’lakk the RiftSplitter -Bal’Lak the Pumeller -To’kash the blood chiller (I need 2 more bosses, if you can suggest me anims and ID's! (Must be from dungeoneering!)) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Great staff and Good comunity! Shops with bandos gear and other pk stuff etc. Paypal donations for various things Pk supplies at quest tab! KBD is added Godwars added! Dagganoth kings added! Great skills zone! Tormented demons added! Corporal beast added! Void and coloured infinities at pc! Colored Whips from PC Working Curse prayers includign turmoil and soul split! Working spirit shield process to make your own spirit shield Warrior guild working 100% with dragon defender! 100% working maze : pay-in 40m : random gift. 100% working glider Workin autocast, All 634 items, WITH Completionist, vet, and max capes. And so much more! Donar zone Pets Donor dragon pets working hunter, to catch imps
I will add some pics l8er
Credits: 50% to Hybrid pvp v3 50% to me, for adding so much ^.^
Have suggestions, feel free to comment.

Recently i have made a pratty successful server:
Krysis-rs!

Note: this is my 1st server so may not be best:

@@ Dungeoneering is 100% added now with bosses! @@
-So far has Har’lakk the RiftSplitter

-To’kash the blood chiller
